headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Waste Management (WM) After A Strong Multi‑Year Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Waste Management's share price still makes sense after a solid run, this piece focuses squarely on what you might be paying for each dollar of value in the business. The stock last closed at US$229.23, with returns of 3.6% over the past 7 days, 3.7% over 30 days, 5.0% year to date, 11.1% over 1 year, 57.4% over 3 years and 122.8% over 5 years. Recent coverage around the waste services and recycling industry has highlighted ongoing investor interest in essential...
